.multiselect-container > li {
    padding-left: 50px;
}
.multiselect-item.multiselect-all {
    padding-left: 0px;
    text-decoration: underline;
}
.multiselect-item.multiselect-group {
    padding-left: 30px;
}
.has-feedback .form-control {
    padding-right: 0px;
}
.multiselect-container > li.multiselect-group-clickable label {
    text-decoration: underline;
}
/* Tighten up snpchip platform list only*/
/*   .btn-ldlink-multiselec  */
.multiselect-container > li > a > label {
    padding: 0px 20px 0px 40px;
}

.form-control-feedback {
    top: 0;
    right: -15px;
}

/* Placeholder Style */
::-webkit-input-placeholder {
   font-size: 90%;
}

:-moz-placeholder { /* Firefox 18- */
   font-size: 90%;
}

::-moz-placeholder {  /* Firefox 19+ */
   font-size: 90%;
}

:-ms-input-placeholder {
    font-size: 90%;
}


.ffWarning {
    display: none;
}
/*
.bk-plot-canvas-wrapper {
    max-width:900px;
    overflow-x: scroll;
}
*/

.haplotype {
    color: black;
    background:#C0C0C0; /* if a multiple grouped */ 
}

/* LDhap Heat Map - Version 4 */
/* Pastel Colors light red, light orage, light blue, and light green */
/* Color Code: http://paletton.com/palette.php?uid=7000u0klLMWnHN3kBNFgZMYgZMY */

.overflowx {
    overflow-x:auto;
}
.overflowy {
    overflow-y:auto;
}

.whats_new {
    height:200px;
    border:1px solid #566473;
    overflow-y:auto;
    margin-bottom:25px;
}

.table {
    min-width: 0;
    display: table;
}
.left-c {   width:auto;
    display: inline-block;
    vertical-align: top;
}
.right-c {
    min-width:300px;
    width:65%;
    display: inline-block;
    vertical-align: top;
}


.left-c > table > tfoot > tr > td,
.right-c > table > tfoot > tr > td {
    font-weight:bold;
}


/* New stuff */

/* Header and Footer */
.header img {
    /*
    width: 60%;
    */
}
.header h4 {
    color: #fff;
    line-height: 0.5em;
}
.footer {
    bottom: 0;
    color: #444;
    padding: 25px 0;
}
.footer ul {
    text-align: center;
}
.footer ul li a {
    color: #444;
}
hr.header {
    border-top: 0.5em solid #bb0e3d;
    margin: 0;
}


caption {
    font-weight:bold;
}


/* Rotate the text on SNPchip table */
th.rotate {
  /* Something you can count on */
  height: 142px;
  white-space: nowrap;
}

th.rotate > div {
  transform: 
    translate(0px, 51px)
    rotate(270deg);
  width: 20px;
}
th.rotate > div > span {
  /*border-bottom: 1px solid #ccc;*/
  /*padding: 5px 10px;*/
}
/* These aren't needed and will be weird if transforms don't work */
.csstransforms & th.rotate {
  height: 142px;
  white-space: nowrap;
}


span.formw > label {
    margin-bottom: 0px;
    font-family: "Lucida Grande",Verdana,Arial,sans-serif;
    font-size: normal;
}

.platform-checkbox {
    padding: 0.2em 0.6em 0.3em;
}

/* From style.css
https://www.broadinstitute.org/mpg/snap/ldsearch.php */

.bolded {
    font-weight: bold;
}
.underlined {
    border-bottom: 1px dotted gray;
}
fieldset#columnAcheckbox {
    min-width: 450px;
}
fieldset#columnAcheckbox div.row span.label, fieldset#columnBcheckbox div.row span.label, fieldset.fullwidthcheckbox div.row span.label {
    padding-top: 1px;
    width: 20px;
}
fieldset#columnBcheckbox {
    min-width: 365px;
}
fieldset div.row span.formw select.yesno {
    width: 80px;
}
/* Custom */

fieldset#columnAcheckbox > div.row,
fieldset#columnBcheckbox > div.row {
    margin-left:15px;
    margin-bottom:-12px;
    font-weight:lighter;
    color: #333;
    font-family: "Lucida Grande",Verdana,Arial,sans-serif;
    font-size: smaller;
}


textarea:valid, .ok {
    color: #555;
}
textarea:invalid, .error {
    color: red;
}
.panel-body > h1 {
    font-size: 1.7em;
}
/* Testing */
@media screen and (max-width: 767px) {
  .dataTables_wrapper .dataTables_info,
  .dataTables_wrapper .dataTables_paginate {
    float: none;
    text-align: center; }
  .dataTables_wrapper .dataTables_paginate {
    margin-top: 0.5em; } 
}
@media screen and (max-width: 640px) {
  .dataTables_wrapper .dataTables_length,
  .dataTables_wrapper .dataTables_filter {
    float: none;
    text-align: center; }
  .dataTables_wrapper .dataTables_filter {
    margin-top: 0.5em; } 
}
.legend{
/* css for agreement*/
font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
font-size:14px;
color:#566473;
font-weight: bold;
}

.overlay{
  opacity:0.5;
  background:white;
  pointer-events: none
}

.tools-owner-title {
    padding-top: 5px;
    padding-bottom: 5px;
    background-color: #F5FAFF;
    color: #0C5C97;
}

.ui-dialog.ui-widget.ui-widget-content {
	background:white; /* and no special background for the dialog */
}
.ui-widget-overlay.ui-front { /* you want this */
	opacity:.10;
}
.modal-dialog1 {
    width: 900px;
    margin: 30px auto;
    position: relative;
}

.form-control1 {
    display: block;
    width: 20%;
    height: 30px;
    padding: 6px 12px;
    font-size: 14px;
    line-height: 1.42857;
    color: #555555;
    background-color: #fff;
    background-image: none;
    border: 1px solid #ccc;
    border-radius: 4px;
    -webkit-box-shadow: inset 0 1px 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, .075);
    box-shadow: inset 0 1px 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, .075);
    -webkit-transition: border-color ease-in-out .15s, box-shadow ease-in-out .15s;
    -o-transition: border-color ease-in-out .15s, box-shadow ease-in-out .15s;
    transition: border-color ease-in-out .15s, box-shadow ease-in-out .15s;
}

.overlay {
  position: fixed; 
  width: 100%; 
  height: 100vh; 
  background-color: white; 
  opacity: 0.9; 
  z-index: 9999; 
  top: 0; 
  left: 0;
  
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  flex-direction: column;
}



.spinner {
  animation: spin 2s infinite linear;
}

/** spin animation */
@keyframes spin {
  from {
    transform: rotate(0deg);
  }

  to {
    transform: rotate(359deg);
  }
}</css><data_table>sp_instance</data_table><demo_data/><description/><docs/><field_list/><has_preview>false</has_preview><id>gds-main-content</id><internal>false</internal><link/><name>GDS main content</name><option_schema/><public>true</public><roles/><script><![CDATA[(function() {
	var session_id = gs.getSessionToken();
	var my_sys_id = gs.getUserID();
	data.access = '';
	var userName = '';
	  var user_item = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
        user_item.addQuery('sys_id', my_sys_id);
        user_item.query();
        user_item.next();
	if(user_item != null){
	   userName = user_item.last_name + ", " + user_item.first_name;
	}

	data.info = {
		userId: my_sys_id,
		sessionId: session_id,
		userName: userName
	};

	data.tasks = [];
	data.userTasks = [];
	data.icSubmittedTasks=[];
	
	data.submittedTasks = [];
	data.icTasks = [];
	data.icSignTasks = [];
	
	//get PI sign record
			var gr1 = new GlideRecord("sc_cat_item");
				gr1.addQuery("short_description", "CCR GDSP Intramural Certification");
				gr1.query();	
				gr1.next();
				var cat_item_id = gr1.getValue('sys_id');


			 var gr_approval_items = GlideRecord('sysapproval_approver');
			 var req_item = gr_approval_items.addJoinQuery('sc_req_item','document_id','sys_id');
			 req_item.addCondition('cat_item', cat_item_id);
       gr_approval_items.addQuery('approver', my_sys_id); 
			 //gr_approval_items.addQuery('document_id.request.requested_for', my_sys_id);
			 gr_approval_items.addQuery('source_table','sc_req_item'); 
			 gr_approval_items.orderByDesc('sys_updated_on');  
			 gr_approval_items.query();
			 while (gr_approval_items.next()){
				 var orginId = '';
				 var tickerNum = '';
				 var org_ticket_num = '';
				 var version = '';
				 var hasParent = '';
				 var selectedOrginId = '';

				 var docId = gr_approval_items.document_id;

				 selectedOrginId = gr_approval_items.document_id.contact_type;
				 if(selectedOrginId == '' || selectedOrginId === undefined || selectedOrginId == 'Web' ){
							orginId = gr_approval_items.document_id.sys_id;
							org_ticket_num = gr_approval_items.document_id.number;
							hasParent = 'false';
					}else{
						 var orgIds = selectedOrginId.split("=");
						 var gr_tracking_item = GlideRecord('u_ccr_tracking_t');
						 gr_tracking_item.addQuery('u_orgid',orgIds[0]);
						 gr_tracking_item.query();

						 if(gr_tracking_item.getRowCount() > 0){
									gr_tracking_item.next();
									orginId = gr_tracking_item.u_orgid;
									org_ticket_num = gr_tracking_item.u_ticket_number;
									version = orgIds[1];
									hasParent = 'true';
						 }else {
									orginId = gr_approval_items.document_id.sys_id;
									org_ticket_num = gr_approval_items.document_id.number;
									hasParent = 'false';
						 }
					}

					var ticket_number = '';
					if(hasParent == 'true'){
							ticket_number = 'CCR_IC' + org_ticket_num.substring(8) + '-' + version;
					}else{
							ticket_number = "CCR_IC" + gr_approval_items.sysapproval.number.substring(8);
					}

					var stage_v = gr_approval_items.document_id.context.stage.name;		
							
					if(stage_v == 'Wait for PI to Sign'){
					   var items = {};
									items.ic_id = ticket_number;
									items.study_name = gr_approval_items.document_id.variables.study_name.toString();
									items.project_title = gr_approval_items.document_id.variables.project_title.toString();
									items.submitted_by = gr_approval_items.sysapproval.opened_by.name.toString();
									items.submitted_date = gr_approval_items.document_id.sys_created_on.toString();
									items.status = gr_approval_items.document_id.context.stage.name.toString();
									items.last_update_date = gr_approval_items.sys_updated_on.toString();
									items.stage = stage_v.toString();
									items.sys_id = gr_approval_items.sys_id.toString();
									items.doc_id = gr_approval_items.document_id.toString();
									items.state = gr_approval_items.state.toString();					
						 data.icSignTasks.push(items);
					}
			}
	//end of PI sign Record 

	/*var gr_ic_sign_items = new GlideRecord('sc_req_item');
	    gr_ic_sign_items.addQuery('requested_for', my_sys_id);
	    gr_ic_sign_items.addQuery()*/
	
	var ernames=['er_investigator','er_email','er_phone', 'er_date', 'er_projectNumber', 'er_projectName', 'er_simpleSize','er_prospective', 'er_restrospective', 'er_human', 'er_nonHuman', 'er_germLine','er_somatic', 'er_dnaType', 'er_rnaType',  'er_microbiome', 'er_mitochrondria', 'er_otherType', 'er_specifyOtherType', 'er_snpArrayData', 'er_numSNP', 'er_expressionArray', 'er_numExpression','er_methylationArray', 'er_numMethylation','er_arrayDerive', 'er_microarrayData', 'er_sequenceData', 'er_somaticSnv', 'er_arrayCgh', 'er_wholeGenome', 'er_wholeExome', 'er_targetGenome', 'er_targetExome', 'er_wholeTranscriptome', 'er_targetTrabscriptome', 'er_epigenomicMark', 'er_sanger', 'er_rrna', 'er_association', 'er_arrayDerivedExpression', 'er_rnaExpression', 'er_derivedMethylation', 'er_otherAnalysis', 'er_spcifiedOtherAnalysis', 'er_individual', 'er_aggregate', 'er_notApplicableDataForm', 'orginId', 'version','er_rat', 'er_mouse', 'er_celegans', 'er_drosophila', 'er_yeast', 'er_yeastSpecies', 'er_bacteria', 'er_bacteriaSpecies','er_noHumanOther', 'er_numDerivedGenotype', 'er_numMicroarrayData', 'er_numSquenceData', 'er_numSomaticSnv', 'er_numArrayCgh','er_numWholeGenome', 'er_numWholeExome', 'er_numTargetGenome', 'er_numTargetedExome', 'er_numWholeTranscriptome', 'er_numTargetedTranscriptome', 'er_numEpigenomic', 'er_numSanger', 'er_numRrna','er_legalRestricton', 'er_describedLegal', 'er_informedConsent','er_otherJust', 'er_specifiedOtherJust','er_nonExistConsent','er_nonAddressConsent', 'er_nonAddressRisk','er_precludedConsent','er_otherConsent', 'er_specifiedOtherConsent', 'er_copyConsent', 'er_gpaAgreed', 'er_gpaDisagree', 'er_gpaUnclear','er_irbAgree', 'er_irbDisagree', 'er_alternative']; 
	data.erTasks = [];
	var gr_er_items = new GlideRecord('u_gdsp_user_submission');
		  gr_er_items.addQuery('u_userid', my_sys_id);
	    gr_er_items.addQuery('u_application', 'GDS_ER');
		  gr_er_items.orderByDesc('sys_updated_on');
		  gr_er_items.query();
	while (gr_er_items.next()){
		var er = {};
		er.sys_create_on = gr_er_items.getValue('sys_created_on');	
		er.requested_for =  gr_er_items.getValue('u_apply_for_id');	
		var er_value = gr_er_items.getValue('u_value');
		var er_temp = er_value.split(",");
		var er_Value = {};
		var er_index = 0;
		for(er_index = 0; er_index < er_temp.length; er_index++){
         var er_vals = er_temp[er_index].split("=");
			   er_Value[er_vals[0]] = er_vals[1];
		}
		for(er_index = 0; er_index < ernames.length; er_index++){
			er[ernames[er_index]] = er_Value[ernames[er_index]];
		}
		er.project_name = er.er_projectName;
		er.investigator = er.er_investigator;
	  er.sys_id = gr_er_items.getDisplayValue("sys_id");
		data.erTasks.push(er);
	}	
	
})();

]]></script><servicenow>false</servicenow><sys_class_name>sp_widget</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-03-31 16:20:02</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>6f829e9adbf1b20054d8ff621f961937</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2114</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GDS main content</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_widget_6f829e9adbf1b20054d8ff621f961937</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-06-28 19:33:56</sys_updated_on><template><![CDATA[<br/>
<div>
    <div class="col-md-12" id="messageDiv" style="display:none;"></div>
    <!--<div class="col-md-12">
      <input type="button" class="btn btn-primary btn-sm active pull-right" ng-click="backToMain()" value="Home" />
    </div>-->
    <div class="col-md-12"><label><a href='' ng-click='backToMain()'> Home    >    </a></label><span style="display:none;" id="titleDiv"></span></div>
    <div class="col-md-12">
        <div class="panel panel-success">
            <div class="panel-heading" id="heading_project" role="tab">
                <h4 class="panel-title">
                    <a aria-controls="collapseProject" aria-expanded="true" data-target="#collapseProject" data-toggle="collapse" role="button">
                  <span class="accordion_icon"><i class="fa fa-minus-square"></i></span> 
                  Project Information</a></h4>
            </div>
            <div aria-labelledby="heading_project" class="panel-collapse collapse in" id="collapseProject" role="tabpanel">
                <div class="tab-content grey-border">
                    <div class="tab-pane active" id="projectInfo">
                        <div class="col-md-12" id="gdsErrorDiv" style="display:none">
                            <font color='red'>
                                <li>Please complete all required fields</li>
                            </font>
                        </div>
                        <div class="col-md-12"> </div>
                        <div class="col-md-12">
                            <div class="col-md-1">
                                <font color='red'>*</font>Project Title</div>
                            <div class="col-md-9"><input type="text" class="form-control" id="projectTitle" /></div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="col-md-12"> </div>
                        <div class="col-md-12">
                            <div class="col-md-1">
                                <font color='red'>*</font>PI Name</div>
                            <div class="col-md-4"><input id="piName" class="form-control"></div>
                            <input type='hidden' id='piFirstName' />
                            <input type='hidden' id='piLastName' />
                            <input type="hidden" id="piUserId" />
                        </div>
                        <div class="col-md-12"> </div>
                        <div class="col-md-12">
                            <div class="col-md-1">
                                <font color='red'>*</font>PI Email</div>
                            <div class="col-md-4"><input type="text" class="form-control" id="piEmail" /></div>
                            <div class="col-md-1">
                                <font color='red'>*</font>PI Phone</div>
                            <div class="col-md-4"><input type="text" class="form-control" id="piPhone" /></div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="col-md-12"> </div>
                        <div class="col-md-12">
                            <div class="col-md-1">
                                <font color='red'>*</font>PI Title</div>
                            <div class="col-md-4"><input type="text" class="form-control" id="piTitle" /></div>
                            <div class="col-md-1">
                                <font color='red'>*</font>PI Branch</div>
                            <div class="col-md-4"><select id="piBranch" class="form-control"></select></div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="col-md-12"> </div>
                        <div class="col-md-12">
                            <div class="col-md-1">
                                <font color='red'>*</font>Organism Type</div>
                            <div class="col-md-4">
                                <select id="organismType" class="form-control"> 
                          <option value="0">Please select a type</option>
                          <option value="human">Human</option>
                          <option value="nonhuman">Non-Human</option>
                          <option value="both">Both Human and Non-Human</option>
                        </select>
                            </div>
                            <div class="col-md-3">
                                <font color='red'>*</font>Do you want to submit a GDS Exception Request? </div>
                            <div class="col-md-1"><input type="radio" name="er" id="erId1" value="yes" />   Yes   <input type="radio" name="er" id="erId2" value="no" checked="checked" />  No
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="col-md-12"> </div>
                        <div class="col-md-12">
                            <div class="col-md-1">Parent GDS</div>
                            <div class='col-md-4'>
                                <select id="selectParent" class="selectpicker" multiple>
                        </select>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="col-md-12"> </div>
                        <div class="col-md-12"> </div>
                        <div class="col-md-12" align='right' id="saveBt">
                            <input type="button" class="btn btn-primary active pull-right" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;" ng-click="saveProjectInformation(0)" value="Save" />
                        </div>
                        <div class="col-md-12" id="updateBt" style="display:none">
                            <input type="button" class="btn btn-primary active pull-right" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;" ng-click="saveProjectInformation(1)" value="Update" />
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <br>
        <!-- User Access Tab content -->

        <div class="panel panel-success" id="acli" style="display:none;">
            <div class="panel-heading" style="padding-top: 5px; padding-bottom: 5px;" id="heading_user" role="tab">
                <h4 class="panel-title" style="display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center;">
                    <a aria-controls="collapseUser" aria-expanded="true" data-target="#collapseUser" data-toggle="collapse" role="button">
                        <span class="accordion_icon"><i class="fa fa-plus-square"></i></span> 
                        User Access</a>
                    <span class="pull-right">
                    <button type="button" class="btn btn-primary  btn-sm" id="accessBtn" ng-click="createNewUserAccess()" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">NEW</button>
                    <!--     
                    <button type="button" class="btn btn-primary  btn-sm" id="viewUserAccessBt" ng-click="viewUserAccess()" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">View/Edit</button> -->
                    </span> 
                </h4>
            </div>
            <div aria-labelledby="heading_user" class="panel-collapse collapse" id="collapseUser" role="tabpanel">
                <div class="tab-content grey-border" id="access">
                    <div class="row">
                        <div class="row">  </div>
 
                        <div class="panel panel-default">
                            <div class="panel-heading">
                                <h2 class="panel-title">User(s) who can access the project</h2>
                            </div>
                            <div class="panel-body">
                                 <!-- remove the input into dialog -->
                                <br>
                                <div style="background-color: lightgrey; padding: 2px 10px; display: flex; align-items: center;" ng-show="c.data.userTasks.length > 0">
                                    <h4> User Access Table</h4>
                                    <span class="badge" style="color: #444; margin-left: 5px;" id="ritm_count">{{ c.data.userTasks.length }}</span>
                                </div>
                                <table class="table table-bordered table-striped table-condensed table-hover" ng-show="c.data.userTasks.length > 0">
                                    <thead>
                                        <tr>
                                            <td colspan="4">
                                                <form class="form-inline">
                                                    <input type="text" class="form-control1" ng-model="searchUserAccess" placeholder="Search" />
                                                </form>
                                            </td>
                                        </tr>
                                        <tr>
                                            <th ng-repeat="column in c.columns3 track by $index" ng-click="c.toggleSort3($index)" style="cursor: pointer">
                                                {{ column.label }}
                                                <span class="glyphicon small" ng-class="{
                                                'glyphicon-chevron-up': column.sort === 'asc',
                                                'glyphicon-chevron-down': column.sort === 'desc'
                                              }">
                                  </span>
                                            </th>
                                        </tr>
                                    </thead>
                                    <tr ng-repeat="row in c.data.userTasks | filter:searchUserAccess" ng-show="$index >= c.pagination3.currentPage * c.pagination3.currentSize &&
                                         $index < (c.pagination3.currentPage + 1) * c.pagination3.currentSize">
                                        <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.first_name }}</td>
                                        <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.last_name }}</td>
                                        <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.access }}</td>
                                        <td class="ritm_number" ng-show="c.data.access != 'Read_Only'"><button type='button' class="btn btn-primary" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;" ng-click="removeUser(row.sys_id);">Remove</button> </td>
                                        <td class="ritm_number" ng-show="c.data.access == 'Read_Only'"><button type='button' class="btn btn-primary" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;" ng-click="removeUser(row.sys_id);" disabled>Remove</button> </td>
                                    </tr>
                                </table>


                                <!-- select the page size -->
                                <form class="form-inline pull-right">
                                    <div class="pagination form-group" ng-show="c.data.userTasks.length > 0">
                                        <label for="pageSize">
                              Items per page
                            </label>

                                        <select id="pageSize" class="form-control" style="display: inline" ng-init="c.pagination3.currentSize = c.pagination3.pageSizes[1]" ng-model="c.pagination3.currentSize" ng-options="sizes for sizes in c.pagination3.pageSizes">
                            </select>
                                    </div>
                                </form>

                                <!-- select the page index (offset) -->
                                <ul class="pagination" ng-show="c.pagination3.currentSize < c.data.userTasks.length">
                                    <li ng-repeat="index in c.getRange3() track by $index" ng-click="c.setPage3($index)">
                                        <a href="">
                              {{ $index + 1 }}
                            </a>
                                    </li>
                                </ul>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
          <!-- end of User Access -->
            <br>
     


        <!-- GDSP Tab content -->
        <div class="panel panel-success" id="gdspli" style="display:none;">
            <div class="panel-heading" style="padding-top: 5px; padding-bottom: 5px;" id="heading_GDSP" role="tab">
                <h4 class="panel-title" style="display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center;">
                    <a aria-controls="collapseGDSP" aria-expanded="true" data-target="#collapseGDSP" data-toggle="collapse" role="button">
                  <span class="accordion_icon"><i class="fa fa-plus-square"></i></span> Genomic Data Sharing Plan </a>
                    <span class="pull-right">    
 									<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary  btn-sm " id="gdspBt" ng-click="createGDSP()" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">NEW</button>
                  <!--    
                  <button type="button" class="btn btn-primary  btn-sm " id="viewGDSPBt" ng-click="viewGDSP()" ng-show="c.data.tasks.length > 0 || c.data.submittedTasks.length > 0" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">View/Edit</button> -->   
                  </span>
                </h4>
            </div>

            <div aria-labelledby="heading_GDSP" class="panel-collapse collapse" id="collapseGDSP" role="tabpanel">

                <div class="tab-content grey-border">

                    <div style="background-color: lightgrey; padding: 2px 10px; display: flex; align-items: center;" ng-show="c.data.tasks.length > 0 && c.data.access != 'Read_Only'">
                        <h4>Draft GDSPs</h4>
                        <span class="badge" style="color: #444; margin-left: 5px;" id="ritm_count">{{ c.data.tasks.length }}</span>
                    </div>

                    <table class="table table-bordered table-striped table-condensed table-hover" ng-show="c.data.tasks.length > 0 && c.data.access != 'Read_Only'">
                        <thead>
                            <tr>
                                <td colspan="3">
                                    <form class="form-inline">
                                        <input type="text" class="form-control1" ng-model="searchDraftGDSP" placeholder="Search" />
                                    </form>
                                </td>
                            </tr>
                            <tr>
                                <th ng-repeat="column in c.columns track by $index" ng-click="c.toggleSort($index)" style="cursor: pointer">
                                    {{ column.label }}
                                    <span class="glyphicon small" ng-class="{
                                                'glyphicon-chevron-up': column.sort === 'asc',
                                                'glyphicon-chevron-down': column.sort === 'desc'
                                              }">
                                  </span>
                                </th>
                            </tr>
                        </thead>
                        <tr ng-repeat="row in c.data.tasks | filter:searchDraftGDSP" ng-show="$index >= c.pagination.currentPage * c.pagination.currentSize &&
                                         $index < (c.pagination.currentPage + 1) * c.pagination.currentSize">
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.project_name }}</td>
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.sys_create_on }}</td>
                            <td>
                                <button class="btn btn-sm btn-primary" ng-click="c.editItem(row.sys_id)" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">
                                  Edit
                                </button>
                                <button class="btn btn-sm btn-primary" ng-click="c.removeItem(row.sys_id)" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">
                                  Remove
                                </button>
                            </td>
                        </tr>
                    </table>

                    <!-- select the page size -->
                    <form class="form-inline pull-right">
                        <div class="pagination form-group" ng-show="c.data.tasks.length > 0">
                            <label for="pageSize">
                              Items per page
                            </label>

                            <select id="pageSize" class="form-control" style="display: inline" ng-init="c.pagination.currentSize = c.pagination.pageSizes[1]" ng-model="c.pagination.currentSize" ng-options="sizes for sizes in c.pagination.pageSizes">
                            </select>
                        </div>
                    </form>
                    <!-- select the page index (offset) -->
                    <ul class="pagination" ng-show="c.pagination.currentSize < c.data.tasks.length">
                        <li ng-repeat="index in c.getRange() track by $index" ng-click="c.setPage($index)">
                            <a href="">
                              {{ $index + 1 }}
                            </a>
                        </li>
                    </ul>

                    <!-- submitted Table -->
                    <br/><br><br>
                    <div style="background-color: lightgrey; padding: 2px 10px; display: flex; align-items: center;" ng-show="c.data.submittedTasks.length > 0">
                        <h4>Submitted GDSPs</h4>
                        <span class="badge" style="color: #444; margin-left: 5px;" id="ritm_count">{{ c.data.submittedTasks.length }}</span>
                    </div>
                    <table class="table table-bordered table-striped table-condensed table-hover" ng-show="c.data.submittedTasks.length > 0">
                        <thead>
                            <tr>
                                <td colspan="7">
                                    <form class="form-inline">
                                        <input type="text" class="form-control1" ng-model="searchSubmittedGDSP" placeholder="Search" />
                                    </form>
                                </td>
                            </tr>
                            <tr>
                                <th ng-repeat="column in c.columns1 track by $index" ng-click="c.toggleSort1($index)" style="cursor: pointer">
                                    {{ column.label }}
                                    <span class="glyphicon small" ng-class="{
                                                'glyphicon-chevron-up': column.sort === 'asc',
                                                'glyphicon-chevron-down': column.sort === 'desc'
                                              }">
                                  </span>
                                </th>
                            </tr>
                        </thead>
                        <tr ng-repeat="row in c.data.submittedTasks | filter: searchSubmittedGDSP" ng-show="$index >= c.pagination1.currentPage * c.pagination1.currentSize &&
                                         $index < (c.pagination1.currentPage + 1) * c.pagination1.currentSize">
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.gdsp_id }}</td>
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.principal_name }}</td>
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.project_name }}</td>
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.status }}</td>
                            <td class="ritm_number">
                                <span ng-switch on='row.approval'>
                                  <span ng-switch-when='Waiting for GPA Review'><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="Request Submitted" title="Request Submitted"/><img src="/images/workflow_active.gifx" Alt="Waiting for GPA review"  title="Waiting for GPA Review"/><img src="/images/workflow_pending.gifx" Alt="Waiting for SD Review" title="Waiting for SD Review"/></span>
                                <span ng-switch-when='Waiting for SD Review'><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="Request Submitted" title="Request Submitted"/><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="GPA approved" title="GPA Approved"/><img src="/images/workflow_active.gifx" Alt="Waiting for SD Review" title="Waiting for SD Review"/></span>
                                <span ng-switch-when='SD Rejected - Waiting for GPA Review'><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="Request Submitted" title="Request Submitted"/><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="GPA approved" title="GPA Approved"/><img src="/images/workflow_rejected.gifx" Alt="SD Rejected" title="SD Rejected"/><img src="/images/workflow_active.gifx" Alt="Waiting for GPA Review" title="Waiting for GPA Review"/><img src="/images/workflow_pending.gifx" Alt="Waiting for SD Review" title="Waiting for SD Review"/></span>
                                <span ng-switch-when='Waiting for PI Resubmit'><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="Request Submitted" title="Request Submitted"/><img src="/images/workflow_rejected.gifx" Alt="GPA Rejected" title="GPA Rejected"/></span>
                                <span ng-switch-when='SD Rejected - Waiting for PI Resubmit'><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="Request Submitted" title="Request Submitted"/><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="GPA Approved" title="GPA Approved"/><img src="/images/workflow_rejected.gifx" Alt="SD Rejected" title="SD Rejected"/><img src="/images/workflow_rejected.gifx" Alt="GPA Rejected" title="GPA Rejected"/></span>
                                <span ng-switch-default><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" title="Request Submitted" Alt="Request Submitted"/><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="GPA approved" title="GPA Approved"/><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="SD Approved" title="SD Approved"/></span>
                                </span>
                            </td>
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.submitted_date}}</td>
                            <td>
                                <button class="btn btn-sm btn-primary" ng-click="viewItem(row.sys_id, row.gdsp_id)" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">
                                  View
                                </button>
                                <button class="btn btn-sm btn-primary" ng-show="(row.approval == 'Waiting for PI Resubmit' || row.approval == 'Completed') && row.access == null && c.data.access != 'Read_Only' " ng-click="displayResubmit(row.sys_id)" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">
                                  Resubmit
                                </button>
                                <button class="btn btn-sm btn-primary" ng-show="row.approval != 'Completed' &&  row.access == null && c.data.access != 'Read_Only'" ng-click="withdraw(row.sys_id, row.gdsp_id)" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">
                                  Withdraw
                                </button>
                                <button class="btn btn-sm btn-primary" ng-click="report(row.sys_id, row.gdsp_id)" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">
                                  Export
                                </button>
                                <input type="hidden" id="{{ row.sys_id }}_orginId" value="{{ row.orginId}}" />
                                <input type="hidden" id="{{ row.sys_id }}_ticket_num" value="{{ row.org_ticket_num }}" />
                                <input type="hidden" id="{{ row.sys_id }}_ticket" value="{{row.gdsp_id}}" />
                            </td>
                        </tr>
                    </table>

                    <!-- select the page size -->
                    <form class="form-inline pull-right">
                        <div class="pagination form-group" ng-show="c.data.submittedTasks.length > 0">
                            <label for="pageSize">
                              Items per page
                            </label>

                            <select id="pageSize" class="form-control" style="display: inline" ng-init="c.pagination1.currentSize = c.pagination1.pageSizes[1]" ng-model="c.pagination1.currentSize" ng-options="sizes for sizes in c.pagination1.pageSizes">
                            </select>
                        </div>
                    </form>

                    <!-- select the page index (offset) -->
                    <ul class="pagination" ng-show="c.pagination1.currentSize < c.data.submittedTasks.length">
                        <li ng-repeat="index in c.getRange1() track by $index" ng-click="c.setPage1($index)">
                            <a href="">
                              {{ $index + 1 }}
                            </a>
                        </li>
                    </ul>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <!-- end of GDSP -->
        <br>
        <!-- IC Tab content ng-click='openIcQUestion()' -->
        <div class="panel panel-success" id="icli" style="display:none;">
            <div class="panel-heading" style="padding-top: 5px; padding-bottom: 5px;" id="heading_IC" role="tab">
                <h4 class="panel-title" style="display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center;">
                    <a aria-controls="collapseIC" aria-expanded="true" data-target="#collapseIC" data-toggle="collapse" role="button">
                              <span class="accordion_icon"><i class="fa fa-plus-square"></i></span> 
                              Institutional Certification
                            </a>
                    <span class="pull-right">
                            <button type="button" class="btn btn-primary  btn-sm" id="icBtn" ng-click="openIcQUestion()" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">NEW</button>

                            <button type="button" class="btn btn-primary  btn-sm " id="viewICBt" ng-click="viewIC()" ng-show="c.data.icTasks.length > 0 || c.data.icSubmittedTasks.length > 0 || c.data.icSignTasks.length > 0" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">View/Edit</button>-->  
                            </span>
                </h4>
            </div>
            <div aria-labelledby="heading_IC" class="panel-collapse collapse" id="collapseIC" role="tabpanel">

                <div class="tab-content grey-border" id="IC">
                    <div style="background-color: lightgrey; padding: 2px 10px; display: flex; align-items: center;" ng-show="c.data.icTasks.length > 0 && c.data.access != 'Read_Only'">
                        <h4>Draft ICs</h4>
                        <span class="badge" style="color: #444; margin-left: 5px;" id="ritm_count">{{ c.data.icTasks.length }}</span>
                    </div>
                    <table class="table table-bordered table-striped table-condensed table-hover" ng-show="c.data.icTasks.length > 0 && c.data.access != 'Read_Only'">

                                    <form class="form-inline">
                                        <input type="text" class="form-control1" ng-model="searchDraftIC" placeholder="Search" />
                                    </form>
                                </td>
                            </tr>
                            <tr>
                                <th ng-repeat="column in c.columns2 track by $index" ng-click="c.toggleSort2($index)" style="cursor: pointer">

                                    'glyphicon-chevron-up': column.sort === 'asc',
                                    'glyphicon-chevron-down': column.sort === 'desc'
                                  }">
                      </span>
                                </th>
                            </tr>
                        </thead>
                        <tr ng-repeat="row in c.data.icTasks | filter:searchDraftIC" ng-show="$index >= c.pagination2.currentPage * c.pagination2.currentSize &&
                             $index < (c.pagination2.currentPage + 1) * c.pagination2.currentSize">
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.study_name }}</td>
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.project_title }}</td>
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.certification_to }}</td>
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.certification_from }}</td>
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.gpa_organization }}</td>

                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.sys_create_on }}</td>

                                <button class="btn btn-sm btn-primary" ng-click="viewICItem(row.sys_id, row.sampleTime, row.sampleConsent)" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">
                      Edit
                    </button>
                                <button class="btn btn-sm btn-primary" ng-click="c.removeItem(row.sys_id)" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">
                      Remove
                    </button>
                            </td>
                        </tr>
                    </table>

                    <!-- select the page size -->
                    <form class="form-inline pull-right">
                        <div class="pagination form-group" ng-show="c.data.icTasks.length > 0">
                            <label for="pageSize">
                  Items per page
                </label>

                            <select id="pageSize" class="form-control" style="display: inline" ng-init="c.pagination2.currentSize = c.pagination2.pageSizes[1]" ng-model="c.pagination2.currentSize" ng-options="sizes for sizes in c.pagination2.pageSizes">
                </select>
                        </div>
                    </form>

                    <!-- select the page index (offset) -->
                    <ul class="pagination" ng-show="c.pagination2.currentSize < c.data.icTasks.length">
                        <li ng-repeat="index in c.getRange2() track by $index" ng-click="c.setPage2($index)">
                            <a href="">
                  {{ $index + 1 }}
                </a>
                        </li>
                    </ul>
 
                  <!-- IC submitted Table -->
                 <br/><br><br>
                 <div style="background-color: lightgrey; padding: 2px 10px; display: flex; align-items: center;" ng-show="c.data.icSubmittedTasks.length > 0">
                        <h4>Submitted ICs</h4>
                        <span class="badge" style="color: #444; margin-left: 5px;" id="ritm_count">{{ c.data.icSubmittedTasks.length }}</span>
                 </div>
                 <table class="table table-bordered table-striped table-condensed table-hover" ng-show="c.data.icSubmittedTasks.length > 0">
                        <thead>
                            <tr>
                                <td colspan="9">
                                    <form class="form-inline">
                                        <input type="text" class="form-control1" ng-model="searchSubmittedIC" placeholder="Search" />
                                    </form>
                                </td>
                            </tr>
                            <tr>
                                <th ng-repeat="column in c.columns4 track by $index" ng-click="c.toggleSort4($index)" style="cursor: pointer">
                                    {{ column.label }}
                                    <span class="glyphicon small" ng-class="{
                                    'glyphicon-chevron-up': column.sort === 'asc',
                                    'glyphicon-chevron-down': column.sort === 'desc'
                                  }">
                      </span>
                                </th>
                            </tr>
                        </thead>
                        <tr ng-repeat="row in c.data.icSubmittedTasks | filter:searchSubmittedIC" ng-show="$index >= c.pagination4.currentPage * c.pagination4.currentSize &&
                             $index < (c.pagination4.currentPage + 1) * c.pagination4.currentSize">
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.ic_id }}</td>
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.study_name }}</td>
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.project_title }}</td>
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.issue_to }}</td>
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.issue_from }}</td>
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.status }}</td>
                            <td class="ritm_number">
                                <span ng-switch on='row.approval'>
                                <span ng-switch-when='Waiting for GPA Review'><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="Request Submitted" title="Request Submitted"/><img src="/images/workflow_active.gifx" Alt="Waiting for GPA review"  title="Waiting for GPA Review"/><img src="/images/workflow_pending.gifx" Alt="Waiting for SD Review" title="Waiting for SD Review"/></span>
                                <span ng-switch-when='Wait for PI to Sign'><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="Request Submitted" title="Request Submitted"/><img src="/images/workflow_active.gifx" Alt="Waiting for PI to sign"  title="Waiting for PI to sign"/><img src="/images/workflow_pending.gifx" Alt="Waiting for SD Review" title="Waiting for SD Review"/></span>  
                                <span ng-switch-when='Waiting for SD Review'><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="Request Submitted" title="Request Submitted"/><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="GPA approved" title="GPA Approved"/><img src="/images/workflow_active.gifx" Alt="Waiting for SD Review" title="Waiting for SD Review"/></span>
                                <span ng-switch-when='Waiting for GPA Review - SD Rejected'><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="Request Submitted" title="Request Submitted"/><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="GPA approved" title="GPA Approved"/><img src="/images/workflow_rejected.gifx" Alt="SD Rejected" title="SD Rejected"/><img src="/images/workflow_active.gifx" Alt="Waiting for GPA Review" title="Waiting for GPA Review"/><img src="/images/workflow_pending.gifx" Alt="Waiting for SD Review" title="Waiting for SD Review"/></span>
                                <span ng-switch-when='Waiting for PI Resubmit'><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="Request Submitted" title="Request Submitted"/><img src="/images/workflow_rejected.gifx" Alt="GPA Rejected" title="GPA Rejected"/></span>
                                <span ng-switch-when='SD Rejected - Waiting for PI Resubmit'><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="Request Submitted" title="Request Submitted"/><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="GPA Approved" title="GPA Approved"/><img src="/images/workflow_rejected.gifx" Alt="SD Rejected" title="SD Rejected"/><img src="/images/workflow_rejected.gifx" Alt="GPA Rejected" title="GPA Rejected"/></span>
                                <span ng-switch-default><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" title="Request Submitted" Alt="Request Submitted"/><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="GPA approved" title="GPA Approved"/><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="SD Approved" title="SD Approved"/></span>
                                </span>
                            </td>
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.submitted_date}}</td>
                            <td>
                                <button class="btn btn-sm btn-primary" ng-click="viewSubmittedIC(row.sys_id, row.ic_id)" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">
                      View
                    </button>
                                <button class="btn btn-sm btn-primary" ng-show="(row.approval == 'Waiting for PI Resubmit' || row.approval == 'Completed') && row.access == null && c.data.access != 'Read_Only' " ng-click="displayICResubmit(row.sys_id)" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">
                      Resubmit
                    </button>
                                <button class="btn btn-sm btn-primary" ng-show="row.approval != 'Completed' && row.access == null && c.data.access != 'Read_Only'" ng-click="withdrawIC(row.sys_id, row.ic_id)" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">
                      Withdraw
                    </button>
                                <button class="btn btn-sm btn-primary" ng-show="row.approval != 'Completed' && c.data.access != 'Read_Only' && row.approval != 'Wait for PI to Sign'" ng-click="reportIC(row.sys_id, row.ic_id, 'pi')" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">
                      Export
                    </button>
                                <button class="btn btn-sm btn-primary" ng-show="row.approval == 'Completed' && c.data.access != 'Read_Only'" ng-click="reportIC(row.sys_id, row.ic_id, 'sd')" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">
                      Export
                    </button>

                                <input type="hidden" id="{{ row.sys_id }}_orginId_ic" value="{{ row.orginId}}" />
                                <input type="hidden" id="{{ row.sys_id }}_ticket_num_ic" value="{{ row.org_ticket_num }}" />
                                <input type="hidden" id="{{ row.sys_id }}_ticket_ic" value="{{row.ic_id}}" />
                            </td>
                        </tr>
                    </table>

                    <!-- select the page size -->
                    <form class="form-inline pull-right">
                        <div class="pagination form-group" ng-show="c.data.icSubmittedTasks.length > 0">
                            <label for="pageSize">
                  Items per page
                </label>

                            <select id="pageSize" class="form-control" style="display: inline" ng-init="c.pagination4.currentSize = c.pagination4.pageSizes[1]" ng-model="c.pagination4.currentSize" ng-options="sizes for sizes in c.pagination4.pageSizes">
                </select>
                        </div>
                    </form>

                    <!-- select the page index (offset) -->
                    <ul class="pagination" ng-show="c.pagination4.currentSize < c.data.icSubmittedTasks.length">
                        <li ng-repeat="index in c.getRange4() track by $index" ng-click="c.setPage4($index)">
                            <a href="">
                  {{ $index + 1 }}
                </a>
                        </li>
                    </ul>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>

        <!-- Exception Request Tab content  tempFunc   data-target="#collapseER"-->
        <div class="panel panel-success" id="erli" style="display:none;">
            <div class="panel-heading" style="padding-top: 5px; padding-bottom: 5px;" id="heading_ER" role="tab">
                <h4 class="panel-title" style="display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center;">
                    <a aria-controls="collapseER" aria-expanded="true" data-target="#" data-toggle="collapse" role="button">
                                  <span class="accordion_icon"><i class="fa fa-plus-square"></i></span>

                                </a>

                </h4>

            </div>

            <div aria-labelledby="heading_ER" class="panel-collapse collapse" id="collapseER" role="tabpanel">

                <div class="tab-content grey-border" id="ER">
                    <div style="background-color: lightgrey; padding: 2px 10px; display: flex; align-items: center;" ng-show="c.data.erTasks.length > 0 && c.data.access != 'Read_Only'">
                        <h4> Draft Exception Requests</h4>
                        <span class="badge" style="color: #444; margin-left: 5px;" id="ritm_count">{{ c.data.erTasks.length }}</span>
                    </div>
                    <table class="table table-bordered table-striped table-condensed table-hover" ng-show="c.data.erTasks.length > 0 && c.data.access != 'Read_Only'">
                        <thead>
                            <tr>
                                <td colspan="9">
                                    <form class="form-inline">
                                        <input type="text" class="form-control1" ng-model="searchDraftER" placeholder="Search" />
                                    </form>
                                </td>
                            </tr>
                            <tr>
                                <th ng-repeat="column in c.columns5 track by $index" ng-click="c.toggleSort5($index)" style="cursor: pointer">
                                    {{ column.label }}
                                    <span class="glyphicon small" ng-class="{
                                    'glyphicon-chevron-up': column.sort === 'asc',
                                    'glyphicon-chevron-down': column.sort === 'desc'
                                  }">
                      </span>
                                </th>
                            </tr>
                        </thead>
                        <tr ng-repeat="row in c.data.erTasks | filter: searchDraftER" ng-show="$index >= c.pagination5.currentPage * c.pagination5.currentSize &&
                             $index < (c.pagination5.currentPage + 1) * c.pagination5.currentSize">
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.project_name }}</td>
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.investigator }}</td>
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.sys_create_on }}</td>
                            <td>
                                <button class="btn btn-sm btn-primary" ng-click="editERItem(row.sys_id)" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">
                      Edit
                    </button>
                                <button class="btn btn-sm btn-primary" ng-click="removeERItem(row.sys_id)" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">
                      Remove
                    </button>
                            </td>
                        </tr>
                    </table>
                    <!-- select the page size -->
                    <form class="form-inline pull-right">
                        <div class="pagination form-group" ng-show="c.data.erTasks.length > 0">
                            <label for="pageSize">
                  Items per page
                </label>

                            <select id="pageSize" class="form-control" style="display: inline" ng-init="c.pagination5.currentSize = c.pagination5.pageSizes[1]" ng-model="c.pagination5.currentSize" ng-options="sizes for sizes in c.pagination5.pageSizes">
                </select>
                        </div>
                    </form>
                    <!-- select the page index (offset) -->
                    <ul class="pagination" ng-show="c.pagination5.currentSize < c.data.erTasks.length">
                        <li ng-repeat="index in c.getRange5() track by $index" ng-click="c.setPage5($index)">
                            <a href="">
                  {{ $index + 1 }}
                </a>
                        </li>
                    </ul>
                    <!-- <br><br><br> -->
                    <!-- add submitted Exception Request table here-->
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>

    </div>
</div>
